altername_name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena 2: Spirits Burst
name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena 2: Spirits Burst
overview: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena 2 - Spirit Burst is the sequel game of the Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena. The only difference is that it has much more realistic backgrounds and many characters.
